data.eml:eml: Genus Trichocera in Morocco: first records from Africa and a new species (Diptera: Trichoceridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Driauach, Ouafaa, Krzemińska, Ewa, Belqat, Boutaïna (2015): Genus Trichocera in Morocco: first records from Africa and a new species (Diptera: Trichoceridae). Zootaxa 4059 (1): 181-190, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.1.10
